name: @xmtp/bot-tools
description: A collection of tools for running high quality bots in Node.js

scripts.release: yarn workspaces foreach --no-private --all npm publish --access public --tolerate-republish && changeset tag
scripts.fresh: find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name 'dist' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + && yarn cache clean && yarn install && yarn build && yarn test --scope=@xmtp/bot-kit-pro && yarn test --scope=@xmtp/redis-persistence && yarn test --scope=@xmtp/bot-starter && yarn test --scope=@xmtp/bot-examples && yarn test --scope=@xmtp/grpc-api-client && yarn test --scope=@xmtp/fs-persistence && yarn test --scope=@xmtp/cli-starter
scripts.fresh2: find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name 'dist' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + && yarn cache clean && yarn install && yarn build --scope=@xmtp/cli-starter && yarn test --scope=@xmtp/cli-starter

author: XMTP Engineering <eng@xmtp.com>
